snippet.title: Pierhead Arcade 2 - Launch Trailer [PC VR]
snippet.description:
Launch trailer for Pierhead Arcade 2, the sequel to the popular virtual reality arcade simulator, now with all new arcade machines. Developed by Mechabit, available for PC VR. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/pierhead-arcade-2

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com

SUPPORT US
We love bringing you the latest VR reviews and game info on our website. Support us by using our affiliate link when buying VR hygiene accessories and replacement foams: https://vrcover.com/shop/?itm=170

#virtualreality #vr #gametrailer
